I'm Babangida Sani, a passionate computer scientist. I embarked on my journey at Bayero University Kano, where I acquired a degree in Computer Science. My path led me to Arewa Data Science Academy, where I ignited my machine learning career. Through my blog, I share insights from this transformative journey, turning knowledge into action for a data-driven world.
